title: Save URL to Wayback Machine
name: save-url-to-wayback-machine-addon

preferences.name: defaultArchiver
preferences.title: Default Archiver
preferences.description: Choose the default archiver to be used when OneClick is enabled.

preferences.name: oneClickSave
preferences.title: One Click Save
preferences.description: Choose whether or not the toolbar button is a one click save to the default archiver or if you would like to choose which archiver to use upon clicking.

description: This addon will add a new item to the context menu and the toolbar menu, allowing you to save the current webpage to the Wayback Machine. The toolbar button also allows you to save the webpage to archive.is.
author: Jonathan McCann
